code: import React,{useState}from'react';import axios from'axios';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Login=()=>{const[id,setId]=useState('');const[password,setPassword]=useState('');const[message,setMessage]=useState('');const handleLogin=async e=>{e.preventDefault();try{const response=await axios.post('http://localhost:8011/api/auth/login/',{id,password},{withCredentials:true});setMessage(response.data);}catch(error){setMessage('로그인 실패: 아이디 또는 비밀번호가 잘못되었습니다.');}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"Login"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:handleLogin,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{children:"ID: "}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",value:id,onChange:e=>setId(e.target.value),required:true})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{children:"Password: "}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"password",value:password,onChange:e=>setPassword(e.target.value),required:true})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",children:"Login"})]}),message&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:message})]});};export default Login;
